channel.title: Shiny on Mostly about R
channel.description: Recent content in Shiny on Mostly about R

item.title: How to take your predictive model to next Level using Shiny
item.description: Building a predictive model must be one of the usual task for students to do in their machine learning or predictive modelling class.However, when I was student I often had lingering question what to do with model now ? In this post I will talk about how to take your predictive model to the next level and make a web app where other people can interact with your model. The final outcome will look like this.
